title: Mortal Kombat
writer: Greg Russo, Dave Callaham, Oren Uziel
short_cast: Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Tadanobu Asano, Hiroyuki Sanada, Mehcad Brooks, Ludi Lin, Chin Han, Joe Taslim, Max Huang, Sisi Stringer
cast: Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Tadanobu Asano, Hiroyuki Sanada, Mehcad Brooks, Ludi Lin, Chin Han, Joe Taslim, Max Huang, Sisi Stringer
genre: Martial Arts Movies, US Movies, Action & Adventure, Sports Movies
desc: On the brink of being conquered by Outworld, Earthrealm fighters driven by an ancient prophecy must win the final tournament to save humanity.
